00073 QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2( QString attrName, QgsCategoryList categories )
00074     : QgsFeatureRendererV2( "categorizedSymbol" ),
00075     mAttrName( attrName ),
00076     mCategories( categories ),
00077     mSourceSymbol( NULL ),
00078     mSourceColorRamp( NULL ),
00079     mRotationFieldIdx( -1 ),
00080     mSizeScaleFieldIdx( -1 )
00081 {
00082   for ( int i = 0; i < mCategories.count(); ++i )
00083   {
00084     QgsRendererCategoryV2& cat = mCategories[i];
00085     if ( cat.symbol() == NULL )
00086     {
00087       QgsDebugMsg( "invalid symbol in a category! ignoring..." );
00088       mCategories.removeAt( i-- );
00089     }
00090     //mCategories.insert(cat.value().toString(), cat);
00091   }
00092 }

00094 QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::~QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2()
00095 {
00096   mCategories.clear(); // this should also call destructors of symbols
00097   delete mSourceSymbol;
00098   delete mSourceColorRamp;
00099 }

00101 void QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::rebuildHash()
00102 {
00103   mSymbolHash.clear();
00104 
00105   for ( int i = 0; i < mCategories.count(); ++i )
00106   {
00107     QgsRendererCategoryV2& cat = mCategories[i];
00108     mSymbolHash.insert( cat.value().toString(), cat.symbol() );
00109   }
00110 }
00111 
00112 QgsSymbolV2* QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::symbolForValue( QVariant value )
00113 {
00114   // TODO: special case for int, double
00115 
00116   QHash<QString, QgsSymbolV2*>::iterator it = mSymbolHash.find( value.toString() );
00117   if ( it == mSymbolHash.end() )
00118   {
00119     if ( mSymbolHash.count() == 0 )
00120       QgsDebugMsg( "there are no hashed symbols!!!" );
00121     else
00122       QgsDebugMsg( "attribute value not found: " + value.toString() );
00123     return NULL;
00124   }
00125 
00126   return *it;
00127 }
00128 
00129 QgsSymbolV2* QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::symbolForFeature( QgsFeature& feature )
00130 {
00131   const QgsAttributeMap& attrMap = feature.attributeMap();
00132   QgsAttributeMap::const_iterator ita = attrMap.find( mAttrNum );
00133   if ( ita == attrMap.end() )
00134   {
00135     QgsDebugMsg( "attribute '" + mAttrName + "' (index " + QString::number( mAttrNum ) + ") required by renderer not found" );
00136     return NULL;
00137   }
00138 
00139   // find the right symbol for the category
00140   QgsSymbolV2* symbol = symbolForValue( *ita );
00141   if ( symbol == NULL )
00142     return NULL;
00143 
00144   if ( mRotationFieldIdx == -1 && mSizeScaleFieldIdx == -1 )
00145     return symbol; // no data-defined rotation/scaling - just return the symbol
00146 
00147   // find out rotation, size scale
00148   double rotation = 0;
00149   double sizeScale = 1;
00150   if ( mRotationFieldIdx != -1 )
00151     rotation = attrMap[mRotationFieldIdx].toDouble();
00152   if ( mSizeScaleFieldIdx != -1 )
00153     sizeScale = attrMap[mSizeScaleFieldIdx].toDouble();
00154 
00155   // take a temporary symbol (or create it if doesn't exist)
00156   QgsSymbolV2* tempSymbol = mTempSymbols[ita->toString()];
00157 
00158   // modify the temporary symbol and return it
00159   if ( tempSymbol->type() == QgsSymbolV2::Marker )
00160   {
00161     QgsMarkerSymbolV2* markerSymbol = static_cast<QgsMarkerSymbolV2*>( tempSymbol );
00162     if ( mRotationFieldIdx != -1 )
00163       markerSymbol->setAngle( rotation );
00164     if ( mSizeScaleFieldIdx != -1 )
00165       markerSymbol->setSize( sizeScale * static_cast<QgsMarkerSymbolV2*>( symbol )->size() );
00166   }
00167   else if ( tempSymbol->type() == QgsSymbolV2::Line )
00168   {
00169     QgsLineSymbolV2* lineSymbol = static_cast<QgsLineSymbolV2*>( tempSymbol );
00170     if ( mSizeScaleFieldIdx != -1 )
00171       lineSymbol->setWidth( sizeScale * static_cast<QgsLineSymbolV2*>( symbol )->width() );
00172   }
00173 
00174   return tempSymbol;
00175 }
00176 
00177 int QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::categoryIndexForValue( QVariant val )
00178 {
00179   for ( int i = 0; i < mCategories.count(); i++ )
00180   {
00181     if ( mCategories[i].value() == val )
00182       return i;
00183   }
00184   return -1;
00185 }

00187 bool QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::updateCategoryValue( int catIndex, const QVariant &value )
00188 {
00189   if ( catIndex < 0 || catIndex >= mCategories.size() )
00190     return false;
00191   mCategories[catIndex].setValue( value );
00192   return true;
00193 }

00211 void QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::addCategory( const QgsRendererCategoryV2 &cat )
00212 {
00213   if ( cat.symbol() == NULL )
00214   {
00215     QgsDebugMsg( "invalid symbol in a category! ignoring..." );
00216   }
00217   else
00218   {
00219     mCategories.append( cat );
00220   }
00221 }

00223 bool QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::deleteCategory( int catIndex )
00224 {
00225   if ( catIndex < 0 || catIndex >= mCategories.size() )
00226     return false;
00227 
00228   mCategories.removeAt( catIndex );
00229   return true;
00230 }

00236 
00237 void QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::startRender( QgsRenderContext& context, const QgsVectorLayer *vlayer )
00238 {
00239   // make sure that the hash table is up to date
00240   rebuildHash();
00241 
00242   // find out classification attribute index from name
00243   mAttrNum = vlayer ? vlayer->fieldNameIndex( mAttrName ) : -1;
00244 
00245   mRotationFieldIdx  = ( mRotationField.isEmpty()  ? -1 : vlayer->fieldNameIndex( mRotationField ) );
00246   mSizeScaleFieldIdx = ( mSizeScaleField.isEmpty() ? -1 : vlayer->fieldNameIndex( mSizeScaleField ) );
00247 
00248   QgsCategoryList::iterator it = mCategories.begin();
00249   for ( ; it != mCategories.end(); ++it )
00250   {
00251     it->symbol()->startRender( context );
00252 
00253     if ( mRotationFieldIdx != -1 || mSizeScaleFieldIdx != -1 )
00254     {
00255       QgsSymbolV2* tempSymbol = it->symbol()->clone();
00256       tempSymbol->setRenderHints(( mRotationFieldIdx != -1 ? QgsSymbolV2::DataDefinedRotation : 0 ) |
00257                                  ( mSizeScaleFieldIdx != -1 ? QgsSymbolV2::DataDefinedSizeScale : 0 ) );
00258       tempSymbol->startRender( context );
00259       mTempSymbols[ it->value().toString()] = tempSymbol;
00260     }
00261   }
00262 
00263 }
00264 
00265 void QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::stopRender( QgsRenderContext& context )
00266 {
00267   QgsCategoryList::iterator it = mCategories.begin();
00268   for ( ; it != mCategories.end(); ++it )
00269     it->symbol()->stopRender( context );
00270 
00271   // cleanup mTempSymbols
00272   QHash<QString, QgsSymbolV2*>::iterator it2 = mTempSymbols.begin();
00273   for ( ; it2 != mTempSymbols.end(); ++it2 )
00274   {
00275     it2.value()->stopRender( context );
00276     delete it2.value();
00277   }
00278   mTempSymbols.clear();
00279 }

00281 QList<QString> QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::usedAttributes()
00282 {
00283   QList<QString> lst;
00284   lst.append( mAttrName );
00285   if ( !mRotationField.isEmpty() )
00286     lst.append( mRotationField );
00287   if ( !mSizeScaleField.isEmpty() )
00288     lst.append( mSizeScaleField );
00289   return lst;
00290 }

00292 QString QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::dump()
00293 {
00294   QString s = QString( "CATEGORIZED: idx %1\n" ).arg( mAttrName );
00295   for ( int i = 0; i < mCategories.count(); i++ )
00296     s += mCategories[i].dump();
00297   return s;
00298 }
00299 
00300 QgsFeatureRendererV2* QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::clone()
00301 {
00302   QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2* r = new QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2( mAttrName, mCategories );
00303   if ( mSourceSymbol )
00304     r->setSourceSymbol( mSourceSymbol->clone() );
00305   if ( mSourceColorRamp )
00306     r->setSourceColorRamp( mSourceColorRamp->clone() );
00307   r->setUsingSymbolLevels( usingSymbolLevels() );
00308   r->setRotationField( rotationField() );
00309   r->setSizeScaleField( sizeScaleField() );
00310   return r;
00311 }
00312 
00313 QgsSymbolV2List QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::symbols()
00314 {
00315   QgsSymbolV2List lst;
00316   for ( int i = 0; i < mCategories.count(); i++ )
00317     lst.append( mCategories[i].symbol() );
00318   return lst;
00319 }

00321 QgsFeatureRendererV2* QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::create( QDomElement& element )
00322 {
00323   QDomElement symbolsElem = element.firstChildElement( "symbols" );
00324   if ( symbolsElem.isNull() )
00325     return NULL;
00326 
00327   QDomElement catsElem = element.firstChildElement( "categories" );
00328   if ( catsElem.isNull() )
00329     return NULL;
00330 
00331   QgsSymbolV2Map symbolMap = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::loadSymbols( symbolsElem );
00332   QgsCategoryList cats;
00333 
00334   QDomElement catElem = catsElem.firstChildElement();
00335   while ( !catElem.isNull() )
00336   {
00337     if ( catElem.tagName() == "category" )
00338     {
00339       QVariant value = QVariant( catElem.attribute( "value" ) );
00340       QString symbolName = catElem.attribute( "symbol" );
00341       QString label = catElem.attribute( "label" );
00342       if ( symbolMap.contains( symbolName ) )
00343       {
00344         QgsSymbolV2* symbol = symbolMap.take( symbolName );
00345         cats.append( QgsRendererCategoryV2( value, symbol, label ) );
00346       }
00347     }
00348     catElem = catElem.nextSiblingElement();
00349   }
00350 
00351   QString attrName = element.attribute( "attr" );
00352 
00353   QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2* r = new QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2( attrName, cats );
00354 
00355   // delete symbols if there are any more
00356   QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::clearSymbolMap( symbolMap );
00357 
00358   // try to load source symbol (optional)
00359   QDomElement sourceSymbolElem = element.firstChildElement( "source-symbol" );
00360   if ( !sourceSymbolElem.isNull() )
00361   {
00362     QgsSymbolV2Map sourceSymbolMap = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::loadSymbols( sourceSymbolElem );
00363     if ( sourceSymbolMap.contains( "0" ) )
00364     {
00365       r->setSourceSymbol( sourceSymbolMap.take( "0" ) );
00366     }
00367     QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::clearSymbolMap( sourceSymbolMap );
00368   }
00369 
00370   // try to load color ramp (optional)
00371   QDomElement sourceColorRampElem = element.firstChildElement( "colorramp" );
00372   if ( !sourceColorRampElem.isNull() && sourceColorRampElem.attribute( "name" ) == "[source]" )
00373   {
00374     r->setSourceColorRamp( QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::loadColorRamp( sourceColorRampElem ) );
00375   }
00376 
00377   QDomElement rotationElem = element.firstChildElement( "rotation" );
00378   if ( !rotationElem.isNull() )
00379     r->setRotationField( rotationElem.attribute( "field" ) );
00380 
00381   QDomElement sizeScaleElem = element.firstChildElement( "sizescale" );
00382   if ( !sizeScaleElem.isNull() )
00383     r->setSizeScaleField( sizeScaleElem.attribute( "field" ) );
00384 
00385   // TODO: symbol levels
00386   return r;
00387 }
00388 
00389 QDomElement QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::save( QDomDocument& doc )
00390 {
00391   QDomElement rendererElem = doc.createElement( RENDERER_TAG_NAME );
00392   rendererElem.setAttribute( "type", "categorizedSymbol" );
00393   rendererElem.setAttribute( "symbollevels", ( mUsingSymbolLevels ? "1" : "0" ) );
00394   rendererElem.setAttribute( "attr", mAttrName );
00395 
00396   // categories
00397   int i = 0;
00398   QgsSymbolV2Map symbols;
00399   QDomElement catsElem = doc.createElement( "categories" );
00400   QgsCategoryList::const_iterator it = mCategories.constBegin();
00401   for ( ; it != mCategories.end(); it++ )
00402   {
00403     const QgsRendererCategoryV2& cat = *it;
00404     QString symbolName = QString::number( i );
00405     symbols.insert( symbolName, cat.symbol() );
00406 
00407     QDomElement catElem = doc.createElement( "category" );
00408     catElem.setAttribute( "value", cat.value().toString() );
00409     catElem.setAttribute( "symbol", symbolName );
00410     catElem.setAttribute( "label", cat.label() );
00411     catsElem.appendChild( catElem );
00412     i++;
00413   }
00414 
00415   rendererElem.appendChild( catsElem );
00416 
00417   // save symbols
00418   QDomElement symbolsElem = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::saveSymbols( symbols, "symbols", doc );
00419   rendererElem.appendChild( symbolsElem );
00420 
00421   // save source symbol
00422   if ( mSourceSymbol )
00423   {
00424     QgsSymbolV2Map sourceSymbols;
00425     sourceSymbols.insert( "0", mSourceSymbol );
00426     QDomElement sourceSymbolElem = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::saveSymbols( sourceSymbols, "source-symbol", doc );
00427     rendererElem.appendChild( sourceSymbolElem );
00428   }
00429 
00430   // save source color ramp
00431   if ( mSourceColorRamp )
00432   {
00433     QDomElement colorRampElem = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::saveColorRamp( "[source]", mSourceColorRamp, doc );
00434     rendererElem.appendChild( colorRampElem );
00435   }
00436 
00437   QDomElement rotationElem = doc.createElement( "rotation" );
00438   rotationElem.setAttribute( "field", mRotationField );
00439   rendererElem.appendChild( rotationElem );
00440 
00441   QDomElement sizeScaleElem = doc.createElement( "sizescale" );
00442   sizeScaleElem.setAttribute( "field", mSizeScaleField );
00443   rendererElem.appendChild( sizeScaleElem );
00444 
00445   return rendererElem;
00446 }

00448 QgsLegendSymbologyList QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::legendSymbologyItems( QSize iconSize )
00449 {
00450   QSettings settings;
00451   bool showClassifiers = settings.value( "/qgis/showLegendClassifiers", false ).toBool();
00452 
00453   QgsLegendSymbologyList lst;
00454   if ( showClassifiers )
00455   {
00456     lst << qMakePair( classAttribute(), QPixmap() );
00457   }
00458 
00459   int count = categories().count();
00460   for ( int i = 0; i < count; i++ )
00461   {
00462     const QgsRendererCategoryV2& cat = categories()[i];
00463     QPixmap pix = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::symbolPreviewPixmap( cat.symbol(), iconSize );
00464     lst << qMakePair( cat.label(), pix );
00465   }
00466   return lst;
00467 }
00468 
00469 QgsLegendSymbolList QgsCategorizedSymbolRendererV2::legendSymbolItems()
00470 {
00471   QSettings settings;
00472   bool showClassifiers = settings.value( "/qgis/showLegendClassifiers", false ).toBool();
00473 
00474   QgsLegendSymbolList lst;
00475   if ( showClassifiers )
00476   {
00477     lst << qMakePair( classAttribute(), ( QgsSymbolV2* )0 );
00478   }
00479 
00480   QgsCategoryList::const_iterator catIt = mCategories.constBegin();
00481   for ( ; catIt != mCategories.constEnd(); ++catIt )
00482   {
00483     lst << qMakePair( catIt->label(), catIt->symbol() );
00484   }
00485   return lst;
00486 }
